name: CoastCoastCoastCoast (C4)
description:
In the future theme parks have fallen out of style. 

Just like the super malls of the 80s they now stand abandoned. Our main character is an urban explorer amazed by these rides time forgot. 

The rides don't work but the rails will do just fine. With your hoverboard, you can experience the thrill felt by people long since passed and just ... 

✨ c  o  a  s  t  ✨

Have fun but be careful! There are anti-hover board devices scattered throughout the track.

WASD or Directional keys to move. 

Left/Right - Rotate around the rail.

Up/Down - Accelerate and slow down.

Enjoy this small thrill, crafted in 48 hours during the West Coast Game Jam, by :

Brandon Fletcher (@trainmon)- Dev

James Curtis (@gendo) - Audio

@owlls - 3d art
